hero.subtitle: Smart platform for managing and sharing JSON files
hero.description: Manage, edit, and share JSON files in the easiest and most secure way. With ShareJSON, your data is organized, secure, and accessible from anywhere.

features.title: Our Features
features.description: With ShareJSON, managing and sharing JSON files becomes simple and intuitive. The application offers a variety of groundbreaking features for efficient and secure data management.

sharing.title: Easy Sharing
sharing.description: Share your files easily with the world, simple and effortless. Link sharing, advanced permissions and various access levels

schemas.title: Schema Management
schemas.description: Create and edit structured JSON schemas for your data, maintain consistent structure, automatically validate data integrity

butterfly.title: Butterfly Hosts
butterfly.description: Support multi-user environments with advanced host management

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.description: Strong security system protecting your data at all times, advanced encryption and detailed access control

api.title: Advanced API
api.description: Full access to your data through an advanced API interface, simple integration with existing systems and remote management

what.title: What is ShareJSON?
what.content: ShareJSON is an innovative platform for sharing and storing JSON files. The application allows developers and system administrators to manage, store, and share data in JSON format in an easy and convenient way. With advanced tools for editing, validating, and visualizing data, ShareJSON makes working with JSON simpler than ever.

who.title: Who is it for?
who.content: The application is designed for developers, system administrators, QA teams, and anyone who works with JSON files. Through the user-friendly interface, even non-technical users can enjoy the benefits of structured data management. Development teams can share test data, API schemas, and data structures in a simple and clear way.

testimonials.title: Join Hundreds of Users
testimonials.quote2: "The schema management saved us so much time"
testimonials.quote3: "The API is simple to use and gives us great flexibility"

useCases.title: Common Use Cases
useCases.description: Discover how ShareJSON can improve workflows in your organization and make data management easier

api.title: API Development
api.content: Store and share API schemas, response examples, and configuration adjustments between development teams

config.title: Configuration Management
config.content: Save, version, and share configuration files between different development environments

data.title: Test Data Management
data.content: Store and share test data in JSON format for use in QA and development processes

api.title: Powerful and Simple API
api.description: Full access to your data through a well-documented API interface. Enable simple integration with other services and tools.
api.feature2: SDK support for leading programming languages

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join the JSON revolution and improve your data management today. Start for free and upgrade according to your needs.
